body_html:
Hi!
I have the same problem with tensorflow 1.6 and cuda 9.0. I am using Pycharm editor and LD_LIBRARY_PATH contains /usr/local/cuda-9.0/extras/CUPTI/lib64, I check LD_LIBRARY_PATH in Pycharm terminal.

2018-03-12 16:23:37.319154: I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:141] Couldn't open CUDA library libcupti.so.9.0. LD_LIBRARY_PATH:
2018-03-12 16:23:37.319179: F ./tensorflow/stream_executor/lib/statusor.h:212] Non-OK-status: status_ status: Failed precondition: could not dlopen DSO: libcupti.so.9.0; dlerror: libcupti.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

body:
Hi!
I have the same problem with tensorflow 1.6 and cuda 9.0. I am using Pycharm editor and LD_LIBRARY_PATH contains /usr/local/cuda-9.0/extras/CUPTI/lib64, I check LD_LIBRARY_PATH in Pycharm terminal.

2018-03-12 16:23:37.319154: I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:141] Couldn't open CUDA library libcupti.so.9.0. LD_LIBRARY_PATH: 
2018-03-12 16:23:37.319179: F ./tensorflow/stream_executor/lib/statusor.h:212] Non-OK-status: status_ status: Failed precondition: could not dlopen DSO: libcupti.so.9.0; dlerror: libcupti.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
